function.name: windowShadeTilt_close
function.description: This function is used to close the slats of window blinds to a specified angle.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to close the slats of the window blinds.

ratio.description: The percentage value to set the slats of the window blinds.
